title: Samlucky O
author: Samlucky O
content: Happy new month/Xmas my 9ja people! as we don enter the end of the season, wetting we don Achieve this year so far? Because celebrating this Xmas without person achieving a tangible thing for this year, e go hard person celebrate am.  although no be only achivement we dey celebrate, but also the life our baba God don give us. E no mean say we no go also celebrate our achivement. Our achivement na a driving force to carry celebrate the end of the season.Apart from life wey baba God give me, the best thing I achieve this year na this my bitcoin account and bitcoin knowledge. and I dey proud of am. Because every other person go attest to am say e no dey easy. That is to say the year no end bad for me, because had it been say I no start am, I for no fit achieve wetting I get so far. If I say make I dey procatinate maybe by next year I for still dey start. Like this now Xmas chicken don sure with bitcoin money. Hehe Thanks to the furum members legendary, hero, Sr member and members. who have in one way or the other help to mold us to wetting we be today. We really appreciate ona because e no easy. If ona no push people, the forum for tire person. That's why e get one thread I been creat, say " we rise by lifting other people" and that statement I don really see am now. But another thing na person go only fit lift us, if we decide to rise.

comments.author: Kelward
comments.body: We get every reason to thank God, everyday and every time, because e no easy to sleep and wake up everyday. Many people follow us start dis year, but dem no de alive today, some de  hospital, some de prison, so if we de alive and healthy, make we thank God.E de important to give special thanks for di last month of di year, because e show say we start and finish di year, so e suppose be month of celebration, to usher us into anoda new year. But make we try de celebrate responsibly, very important.One of my achievements dis year na to join dis forum, wey don enlighten me well well about crypto matters. The knowledge don help increase my income in more dan one way.

comments.author: Doan9269
comments.body: Quote from: Samlucky O on December 01, 2023, 05:14:52 AMHappy new month/Xmas my 9ja people! as we don enter the end of the season, wetting we don Achieve this year so far? Because celebrating this Xmas without person achieving a tangible thing for this year, e go hard person celebrate am.  although no be only achivement we dey celebrate, but also the life our baba God don give us. E no mean say we no go also celebrate our achivement. Our achivement na a driving force to carry celebrate the end of the season.It's still a new month which is the last month in the year 2023 this month of December is also a good indicator just as October signal us for a bull market when we first started it, i can see that from the early hours of this new month that the market is fast rising and bitcoin was around $38,200 and other altcoins were also rising along together, it's a perfect way to start a month and also expect that althrough the month is going to be a favourable crypto season, but the Christmas is still about three weeks to this time, the month is still fresh and there's more to expect coming from it before the new year.

comments.author: Makus
comments.body: Happy new month and merry Christmas to every member of this forum, just as you talk our life alone na enough reason to take thank papa God even if person no too get achievement for this year dem say "it is better to be a Dog than to be a dead lion" meaning e better as we dey alive even if money no dey than to be one rich man wey don die go. So long as say life dey, hope still yakatah for ground, na to just dey apply the right mindset and hard work so that life fit better.Then concerning wattin I don achieved this year, on the 11 of July naim I take create this account so, and the wey the account take grow na very big achievement for me, the amount of knowledge wey I don get concerning bitcoin and other crypto na very big achievement as well, because na when you know something naim e go dey hard for person to use that thing take scam you. So knowledge alone na very big achievement. And This year my bitcoin talk account go reach full member.Praise God!!!!

comments.author: Obim34
comments.body: The year is coming to an end and we should be able to acknowledge the fact that God has been faithful and has really helped us even in our wrongs, he still never let us to fumble and allow our enemies laugh at us. Despite the plans and strategies the enemies might have put in for our bad God still saw us through and brought us here to the last month of the year, he deserves our appreciation not all those who started the year with us is able to witness this day but look at us very healthy and strong. Who no dey grateful no understand this kind thing God do for us, this live alone na wetin people even with their money no fit buy, how much we. God who has kept us to the first day of the last month of the year will surely see us through the remaing days of 2023 and we all will launch together into the new year....... Happy Xmas / New month

comments.author: Samlucky O
comments.body: Quote from: Doan9269 on December 01, 2023, 09:35:12 AMIt's still a new month which is the last month in the year 2023 this month of December is also a good indicator just as October signal us for a bull market when we first started it, i can see that from the early hours of this new month that the market is fast rising and bitcoin was around $38,200 and other altcoins were also rising along together, it's a perfect way to start a month and also expect that althrough the month is going to be a favourable crypto season, but the Christmas is still about three weeks to this time, the month is still fresh and there's more to expect coming from it before the new year. With the way I dey see bitcoin move lately, I think the season na good one. Bitcoin price early this year na very big shock to all Crypto investors, when the pricw been fall dip to $15k, but before the year don dey end like this, we don nearly reach $40k dollars. so na better achivement because person wey been dey received $40 for campegn, at the rate of $15k per Bitcoin and $40 at $38k per bitcoin now. You go see say the price convention that time and now no be thesame.

comments.author: Spaceman1000$
comments.body: Quote from: Samlucky O on December 01, 2023, 05:14:52 AMHappy new month/Xmas my 9ja people! as we don enter the end of the season, wetting we don Achieve this year so far? Because celebrating this Xmas without person achieving a tangible thing for this year, e go hard person celebrate am.  although no be only achivement we dey celebrate, but also the life our baba God don give us. E no mean say we no go also celebrate our achivement. Our achivement na a driving force to carry celebrate the end of the season.Apart from life wey baba God give me, the best thing I achieve this year na this my bitcoin account and bitcoin knowledge. and I dey proud of am. Because every other person go attest to am say e no dey easy. That is to say the year no end bad for me, because had it been say I no start am, I for no fit achieve wetting I get so far. If I say make I dey procatinate maybe by next year I for still dey start. Like this now Xmas chicken don sure with bitcoin money. Hehe Thanks to the furum members legendary, hero, Sr member and members. who have in one way or the other help to mold us to wetting we be today. We really appreciate ona because e no easy. If ona no push people, the forum for tire person. That's why e get one thread I been creat, say " we rise by lifting other people" and that statement I don really see am now. But another thing na person go only fit lift us, if we decide to rise.Omo my guy, reasons plenty to use thank God for this year, as you dey celebrate your knowledge about Bitcoin, na so others dey celebrate another of their achievement or victory,  the end of the dey year, dey give us opportunity to use reflect back from the beginning of the year way when we begin hustle and bustle so tey we come reach the end of the year baba e no easy.Staying alive Omo na big achievement oh, because na person way dey alive go celebrate whatever him don fail or achieve.Omo for me, there was a Time way things way unfold for this country pain me, when we been elect our leaders but INEC come help us select the leaders way them want from us, Omo that period of the Year pain me shaa, but then I really appreciate the journey so far, and BABA God help us come reach today.

comments.author: Mr.suevie
comments.body: Thank you my brother, it's almost as if the year just started and now it's already the last month of 2023 , Omo the year has been hectic no doubt but we thank God, with so much tension up and down. Many people actually started the journey but all gave up at some point in time. I thank God for so many achievement and one of them is also the successful growth in knowledge and finance too and so many vast benefits that are here in this community. Also another important note is that I thank God for my increase in merit too

comments.author: Mate2237
comments.body: We thank God for everyone and everything. And the price of Bitcoin is not too bad so the year is favorable to many and the only thing wey come spoil the year na the transaction fee wey come spoil everything because as e be so, many people e no go fit make transaction because of the fee. If the fee was low then many of us for celebrate this Christmas with a good style. As a member of this great forum I have noticed that di year started well and ending well. And also the local board here. The growth is tremendous. If you create a thread today and within 24hours you no go see your thread in the first page. And mean say the board dey do well. Happy New Month and happy Christmas in advance to all active members.

comments.author: letteredhub
comments.body: Quote from: Mr.suevie on December 01, 2023, 08:51:40 PMThank you my brother, it's almost as if the year just started and now it's already the last month of 2023 , Omo the year has been hectic no doubt but we thank God, with so much tension up and down. Many people actually started the journey but all gave up at some point in time. I thank God for so many achievement and one of them is also the successful growth in knowledge and finance too and so many vast benefits that are here in this community. Also another important note is that I thank God for my increase in merit too life nah about thanksgiving both for the good and bad things way the happen, the thing be say if bad things no happen we no go see a course to give thanks for the good things. And life no need to delay things, anything you get to do just do am no procrastinate cos everyday nah so life the pass on as night the cover day the break. Growth na wetin every person the seek for especially for this forum nah wetin we all pray for as we the grow for knowledge make also grow for money too. Inno easy, no be all the people wey start the year nah come reach here so we thank God.

comments.author: Benedictare
comments.body: Same to you my dear ,  plenty of us don dey carried  away by the season we thank Baba God for this him blessing wey he shower us this year say we no follow nija hardship go ,wey he use Bitcoin save us and our family members from nija Pheroes ,we thank Baba God for the many many things wey him give and do for  us this year most especially life because na who get life go fit make am from the beginning of this year to dis moment and I believe am say him go make us see end of this year and even crossover to see next year wey go come make us experience the halving  and enjoy am.  Na my prayer say we go enjoy our Bitcoin halving moni with our loved ones another person no go enjoy am for us i wish my Bitcoin family ,God bless you all .Merry Christmas and a Prosperous new year in advance.

comments.author: Y3shot
comments.body: E no dey easy to see the the last month of the year,   many people no get this opportunity.  This na month we really need to thankGod for the gift of life,  this is more reason why we need to thankGod.  Another thing wey I need to talk is if the money, car, and house we been dey target to get this year and we ended up not getting them, make e no let us they panic we go still get ahm as far as their is life . The end of the year no mean say as the year dey end like this man no go get wetin him suppose to get for life.

comments.author: Richbased
comments.body: It has really been a journey far fetched, people have lost, gained, discovered, learn and teach others lots of things this year. For me my greatest achievement is this Bitcointalk forum as this forum have helped me to learn so many things that will be helpful to me in life, wish I knew about the forum earlier there would have been a level that I would have been by now but notwithstanding, above all I give my creator praise for safe guarding me so far, I might not have achieved all I wanted to achieve this year but I thank God for my life, the life of my family and well wishers and I urge you all that let love lead as we need each other before we can achieve some certain growth and development. Merry Christmas and  a prosperous new year to you all.

comments.author: Mayor of ogba
comments.body: Happy New Month and Merry Xmas my sisters/brothers, e no easy to survive for our Naija for the way things be, and that one na wey thing we go take thank God. Person wey be dey guide me for my Bitcoin journey be tell me say e don dey late to invest in Bitcoin because say I no be whale, but as I started to operate for this forum, I come see am say e never late to invest in Bitcoin, so I dey thank God for bringing me to this forum. Now, I dey accumulate Bitcoin small small with the DCA strategy. QuoteLike this now Xmas chicken don sure with bitcoin money. Hehe Op, I am not sure if this Xmas will go well for my side o, because any money wey I get now, I dey invest am for Bitcoin and keep money way I go use chop food, so that when Bitcoin go reach $100k man go dey alright.

comments.author: Jamestown70
comments.body: Happy Xmas in advance to you and our fellow bicoiners for this forum, life alone na big achievement to me so no be because I no get money I no go celebrate the little I have I go use am well and also appreciate God for his love and mercy towards me at least this year I archieve something tangible from my academics so even if I no get monatary achievement sef that alone don give me excess joy and try not to place any other thing above life wey you see so because this year alone millions of people don die and some na hospital Dem dey eriga say na who die nai lose so as I dey I life I go still get chance to achieve more in the future.

comments.author: Hewlet
comments.body: No be small thing when baba God don do for us o! For me, the year started very rough and e come be like say na one of those years when I go suffer wetin no nice but at the end of the day, it is becoming one of my best year ever. Inside this year I don discover so many good qualities about my life when I never been de see. I don start to de very dependent on myself for my needs, I don achieve one or two things when baba God don give me and even as de year de draw to a close, instill de see cross J hand until my matter and I de very grateful for hwfa he has led me thus far. I have learnt some of my life lesson also and moving into the new year, I believe say everything go sure wella by Gods grace and I'm just very grateful for life and the privilege to have come this far. Na this year too I take join the forum and I sure get plenty reasons to be grateful for it.

comments.author: Roseline492
comments.body: Quote from: Samlucky O on December 01, 2023, 05:14:52 AMHappy new month/Xmas my 9ja people! as we don enter the end of the season, wetting we don Achieve this year so far? Because celebrating this Xmas without person achieving a tangible thing for this year, e go hard person celebrate am.  although no be only achivement we dey celebrate, but also the life our baba God don give us. E no mean say we no go also celebrate our achivement. Our achivement na a driving force to carry celebrate the end of the season.Yeah you are right because irrespective of most people perception, view or understanding about celebration we don't necessarily need to achieve everything before we can celebrate because at least if there is nothing to celebrate life should be worth celebrating. To day alive reach now is only the grace of God because if you they listen to news about so many things way they happen everyday and people way they kpai, you go no say we supposed to they celebrate everyday, so i no they reason Xmas celebrate based on the things way we done get but instead na the life I they celebrate because na person way they alive na him they hustle.

comments.author: Miles2006
comments.body: Quote from: Roseline492 on December 04, 2023, 10:20:33 AMQuote from: Samlucky O on December 01, 2023, 05:14:52 AMHappy new month/Xmas my 9ja people! as we don enter the end of the season, wetting we don Achieve this year so far? Because celebrating this Xmas without person achieving a tangible thing for this year, e go hard person celebrate am.  although no be only achivement we dey celebrate, but also the life our baba God don give us. E no mean say we no go also celebrate our achivement. Our achivement na a driving force to carry celebrate the end of the season.Yeah you are right because irrespective of most people perception, view or understanding about celebration we don't necessarily need to achieve everything before we can celebrate because at least if there is nothing to celebrate life should be worth celebrating. To day alive reach now is only the grace of God because if you they listen to news about so many things way they happen everyday and people way they kpai, you go no say we supposed to they celebrate everyday, so i no they reason Xmas celebrate based on the things way we done get but instead na the life I they celebrate because na person way they alive na him they hustle. The first thing wey everybody suppose celebrate right now na the gift of life e dey sure for everybody irrespective of achievement, rank, wealth etc na the gift of life dey important.I will not blame anyone celebrating wealth or anything cause this year was a tough year for everyone, maybe no be money problem but other things dey so celebrating achievement na still better thing but in the processing of celebrating we should not forget to acknowledge our creator.

comments.author: Marykeller
comments.body: God has been so faithful this year, I no fit thank God less for the life and the blessing He has showered on me from the beginning of the year to the end of it wey we d now. It is not by my might but by His grace that I am alive to celebrate another Christmas wey d come so in a few weeks time. I believe by the special grace of God we all go see another beautiful year by next year. Nothing bad go come our way even if our government throw all shades of hardship come our way. We go always jump and pass am with good health, prosperity, long life, understanding, wisdom and intellectuals to keep posting quality post in the forum without losing focus because of our family problems or country wahala

comments.author: iBaba
comments.body: Thank you buddy, it is so refreshing to have witnessed this month of December once again and it is something that one should be very proud off. Living long on the face of the earth is not something that any of us have control over since we can’t account for the amount of breathe with take on this life. That alone is enough to make us humble and grateful for life. The month of December is the close of every year where January is the beginning of every year. It is a month of reflection for me where I sit to think about and recount for all the deeds and misdeeds I have done, that is, all the good, bad and the ugly side of my life are caused as a result of one incident or the other.It is a thing of joy and happiness to remain life and healthy and to be able to carry out your daily activities here. There are 365 days in a week, in every 24 hours, there are people who lose their lives trying to fend for themselves and family, just like we do, and they never wronged anyone for death to visit them, which means, we don’t really have the power to dictate our stay here , therefore, we can only be grateful.I have already started my diary for the year and it is going to contain some hard and soft decisions but the buttomline is; I am going to leave an open-minded year through thereby opening my minds into accepting failure but failing forward and ahead.
